Question: This person appeared on the Dick Cavett show in 1974 and spoke of her history and life with Arnaz.
Hints: The following year, this person did a musical on Broadway, Wildcat, co-starring Paula Stewart.
On April 18, 1989, this person was at her home in Beverly Hills when she complained of chest pains.
This person was nominated for an Emmy Award thirteen times, and won four times.
